items.description: Code for our DLS'21 paper - BODMAS: An Open Dataset for Learning based Temporal Analysis of PE Malware.
items.title: BODMAS

items.description: Contagio is a collection of the latest malware samples, threats, observations, and analyses.
items.title: Contagio

items.description: C² tracking and malware database.
items.title: CyberCrime

items.description: Dataset of packed ELF samples.
items.title: Dataset of Packed ELF

items.description: Sanitized version of the original dataset, PackingData, removing packed samples from the Notpacked folder but also samples in packer folders that failed to be packed (having a same hash as the original unpacked executable).
items.title: Dataset of Packed PE

items.description: Collection of features from PE files that serve as a benchmark dataset for researchers.
items.title: Ember

items.description: Make datasets like FFRI Dataset.
items.title: FFRI Dataset Scripts

items.description: Curated dataset of malware and benign Windows executable samples for malware researchers containing 1,044,394 Windows executable binaries and corresponding image representations with 864,669 labelled as malware and 179,725 as benign.
items.title: MaleX

items.description: Dataset of about 5,000 packed malware samples.
items.title: Malfease

items.description: Contains the recorded behavior of malicious software (malware) and has been used for developing methods for classifying and clustering malware behavior (see the JCS article from 2011).
items.title: Malheur

items.description: Dataset of 11,688 malicous PE files collected from 500 drive-by download servers over a period of 11 months in 2013 (DISCONTINUED).
items.title: Malicia

items.description: Free Malware repository providing researchers access to samples, malicious feeds, and Yara results.
items.title: MalShare

items.description: Malware samples, analysis exercises and other interesting resources.
items.title: Malware Archive

items.description: The Malware Museum is a collection of malware programs, usually viruses, that were distributed in the 1980s and 1990s on home computers.
items.title: The Malware Museum

items.description: Project operated by abuse.ch aimed to collect and share malware samples, helping IT-security researchers and threat analysts protecting their constituency and customers from cyber threats.
items.title: MalwareBazaar

items.description: Yet another malware collection in the Internet.
items.title: MalwareGallery

items.description: Bringing you the best of the worst files on the Internet.
items.title: MalwareSamples

items.description: MalwareTips is a community-driven platform providing the latest information and resources on malware and cyber threats.
items.title: MalwareTips

items.description: Semi-public dataset of 3,467 samples captured in the wild from Sep 2005 to Jan 2006 by mail traps, user submissions, honeypots and other sources aggregated by the OARC, available to qualified academic and industry researchers upon request.
items.title: OARC Malware Dataset

items.description: Online collection of malware samples (formerly Offensive Computing).
items.title: Open Malware Project

items.description: Original dataset with sample PE files packed with a large variety of packers, including ASPack, BeRoEXEPacker, exe32pack, eXpressor, FSG, JDPack, MEW, Molebox, MPRESS, Neolite, NSPack, Pckman, PECompact, PEtite, RLPack, UPX, WinUpack, Yoda's Crypter and Yoda's Protector.
items.title: PackingData

items.description: Datasets and codes that are needed to reproduce the experiments in the paper "When Malware is Packing Heat".
items.title: Packware

items.description: Crackme's, keygenme's, serialme's ; the "tuts4you" folder contains many packed binaries.
items.title: RCE Lab

items.description: Dataset of 10 common Malware files, packed with about 40 different runtime packers in over 500 versions and options, with a total of about 5,000 samples.
items.title: Runtime Packers Testset

items.description: Slovak Antivirus Center, non-commercial project of AVIR and ESET companies ; contains packers, detectors and unpackers.
items.title: SAC

items.description: Sophos-ReversingLabs 20 Million dataset.
items.title: SOREL

items.description: Project created to make the possibility of malware analysis open and available to the public.
items.title: theZoo

items.description: Another online malware database.
items.title: ViruSign

items.description: Best of the worst kind of files on the Internet.
items.title: VirusSamples

items.description: Virus online database with more than 44 millions of samples.
items.title: VirusShare

items.description: Giant database dedicated to combating malware in the digital world.
items.title: VirusSign

items.description: File analysis Web service for detecting malware.
items.title: VirusTotal

items.description: Site dedicated to providing information about computer viruses.
items.title: VX Heaven

items.description: PL-CERT based open source MWDB python application holding a malware database containing every APT sample from 2010 and over 7.5M maliciousbinaries.
items.title: VX Underground

items.description: Online malware database.
items.title: VXvault

items.description: Cooperative listing of malwares reported as being in the wild by security professionals.
items.title: WildList

items.description: Advanced software protection and security for Windows 32-bit executables.
items.title: Alienyze

items.description: Compression tool for executable files (type EXE) or DLL's relying on UPX 3.96.
items.title: Alternate EXE Packer

items.description: Position-independent(reflective) PE loader that enables in-memory execution of native PE files(EXE, DLL, SYS).
items.title: Amber

items.description: Custom packer used in malware campaigns using RunPE techniques for evading AV mitigation methods.
items.title: Andromeda

items.description: APK encryption and shell protection supporting Java and C++.
items.title: APKProtect

items.description: Incorporates both a license manager and wrapper system for protecting PE files.
items.title: Armadillo

items.description: Packer utility for compressing and complicating reversing compiled native code (native files), protecting resources, adding DRM, and packing into an optimized loader.
items.title: ASM Guard

items.description: Advanced solution created to provide Win32 EXE file packing and to protect them against non-professional reverse engineering.
items.title: ASPack

items.description: Multifunctional EXE packing tool designed for software developers to protect 32-bit applications with in-built application copy protection system.
items.title: ASProtect 32

items.description: Tool for protecting 64-bit applications and .NET applications for Windows against unauthorized use, industrial and home copying, professional hacking and analysis of software products distributed over the Internet and on any physical media.
items.title: ASProtect 64

items.description: Low-level mutator (Headers/EP obfuscator) for native Windows PE files (x32/x64).
items.title: Astral-PE

items.description: Legitimate executable encryption service.
items.title: AutoIT

items.description: Encrypts the complete software you aim to protect, and shields it with a security shell, AxEngine, best-of-breed anti-debugging and anti-disassembly methods are then injected into your software.
items.title: AxProtector

items.description: Protection tool using the second generation Android Hardening Protection, loading the encrypted DEX file from memory dynamically.
items.title: BangCle

items.description: Bero EXE Packer (BEP) for 32-bit windows executables.
items.title: Bero

items.description: EXE protection software against crackers and decompilers.
items.title: BIN-crypter

items.description: Code Virtualizer is a powerful code obfuscation system for Windows, Linux and macOS applications that helps developers to protect their sensitive code areas against Reverse Engineering with very strong obfuscation code, based on code virtualization.
items.title: Code Virtualizer

items.description: An open-source, free protector for .NET applications.
items.title: ConfuserEx

items.description: Compressing linker for Windows, specifically targeted towards executables with a size of just a few kilobytes.
items.title: Crinkler

items.description: Simply and powerful plugin for Total Commander used for file encryption using 100 algorithms and 5 modes.
items.title: DarkCrypt

items.description: Android app obfuscation & security protocols for mobile app protection.
items.title: DexGuard

items.description: Multi-layered RASP solution that secures your Android and iOS apps against static and dynamic analysis, illegal use and tampering.
items.title: DexProtector

items.description: GUI tool to compress, encrypt ad password-protect a .NET application or embed .NET libraries.
items.title: DotBundle

items.description: Straightforward and lightweight, command-line piece of software written in C that allows you to compress and pack Microsoft .NET Framework executable files.
items.title: DotNetZ

items.description: Suite of software and tools that offer a complete solution for software protection, copy protection, and license management.
items.title: ElecKey

items.description: Encrypts 64-bit elf files that decrypt at runtime.
items.title: ELF Packer

items.description: Simple ELF crypter using RC4 encryption.
items.title: ELFCrypt

items.description: ELF packer for i386 original version from sk2 by sd.
items.title: ELFuck

items.description: Professional system for executable files licensing and protection.

items.description: Application virtualization system for Windows.
items.title: Enigma Virtual Box

items.description: This is a packer for exe under win32.
items.title: Eronona-Packer

items.description: Bundles application files into a single PE32 file.
items.title: EXE Bundle

items.description: Anti-cracking protection and licensing tool for PE files featuring compression and encryption polymorphic technology.
items.title: EXE Stealth

items.description: A Simple Linux ELF Runtime Crypter.
items.title: Ezuri

items.description: Utility that allows to compress executables as a shell script.
items.title: GzExe

items.description: PE packer with Huffman compression and XOR encryption.
items.title: hXOR-Packer

items.description: Easiest and most powerful mobile app security solution.
items.title: LIAPP

items.description: LM-X License Manager lets you protect your products against piracy by enforcing various levels of security, save time, and reduce business risks.
items.title: LM-X License Manager

items.description: Just a modern packer for elf binaries ( works on linux executables only ).
items.title: m0dern_p4cker

items.description: Midgetpack is a binary packer for ELF binaries, such as burneye, upx or other tools.

items.description: Compresses (using LZMA) and protects PE, .NET or Mach-O programs against reverse engineering.
items.title: MPRESS

items.description: A proof-of-concept packer for .NET executables, designed to provide a starting point to explain the basic principles of runtime packing.
items.title: NetCrypt

items.description: Executable compressor for your Windows or Linux .NET application executable file using LZMA.
items.title: .netshrink

items.description: NPack - Can compress 32bits and 64bits exe, dll, ocx, scr Windows program.
items.title: NPack - Can compress 32bits and 64bits exe, dll, ocx, scr Windows program.

items.description: Feature-rich professional software protection and licensing system designed as a cost effective and easy to implement, yet reliable and non-invasive way to protect your 32- and 64-bit Windows software applications and games from reverse engineering.
items.title: Obsidium

items.description: Packer compressing .net assemblies, (ab)using the PE format for data storage.
items.title: Origami

items.description: Binary packer for the Mach-O file format.
items.title: OS-X_Packer

items.description: Pakkero is a binary packer written in Go made for fun and educational purpose.

items.description: In-memory packer for macOS Mach-O bundles.

items.description: Permissively-licensed packer for ELF executables using LZMA Zstandard or Deflate compression.
items.title: Papaw

items.description: Simple packer for Windows 32-bits PE files.
items.title: PE-Packer

items.description: A PE file packer.
items.title: PE-Toy

items.description: Software protection system for Windows executable files ; protects your applications from tampering and reverse engineering, and provides extensive support for software license key management, including support for time trial periods.
items.title: PELock

items.description: Simple PE Packer Which Encrypts .text Section I release a simple PE file packer which encrypts the .text section and adds a decryption stub to the end of the last section.
items.title: PePacker

items.description: PE-SHiELD is a program, which encrypts 32-bit Windows EXE files, leaving them still executable.
items.title: PEShield

items.description: Free Win32 (Windows 95/98/2000/NT/XP/Vista/7/etc) executable (EXE/DLL/etc) compressor.
items.title: PEtite

items.description: Framework for automatically creating stealth binaries that target a very low detection rate in a Windows environment.
items.title: PEzoNG

items.description: Open-Source Shellcode & PE Packer.
items.title: PEzor

items.description: Multi-Packer wrapper letting us daisy-chain various packers, obfuscators and other Red Team oriented weaponry.
items.title: ProtectMyTooling

items.description: Simple and efficient way to convert a PHP/Python script to a standalone executable.
items.title: RapidEXE

items.description: Silent Packer is an ELF / PE packer written in pure C.
items.title: Silent-Packer

items.description: Simple PE32 Packer with aPLib compression library.

items.description: A very simple windows EXE packing tool for learning or investigating PE structure.

items.description: Packs 32 & 64bit applications with DLLs, data files, 3rd party run-time into one single executable that runs instantly, with no installs or hassles.

items.description: Windows x86 PE Packer In C++.

items.description: PE file manipulation library.

items.description: PE file packer detection tool, part of the Unix package "pev".
items.title: PEPack

items.description: CLI tool to scan PE files to identify how they were constructed.
items.title: PEscan

items.description: Old-school reverse engineering tool (with a long history since 2002) for manipulating PE files.
items.title: PETools

items.description: Provides a quick and easy way to view the structure and content of 32-bit Portable Executable (PE) and Component Object File Format (COFF) files.

items.description: Most feature-packed program for inspecting the inner workings of your own software, and more importantly, third party Windows applications and libraries for which you do not have source code.

items.description: Dynamic binary instrumentation framework for the IA-32, x86-64 and MIC instruction-set architectures that enables the creation of dynamic program analysis tools.

items.description: Implemention attempt of the general approach for extracting the original hidden code of PE files without any heuristic assumptions.

items.title: PortEx

items.description: PE file signature-based scanner.

items.description: Programmer's Tools, a web site dedicated for all kinds of tools and utilities for the true WinBloze programmer, including packers, crypters, etc.
